name: Looking for Exit
description:
This game just like a slender, There a 2 challenge that you can try like Collect 4 Pages or Collect 8 Key, All tree had a collider you cannot passing them, In Four Pages You Need to Find some paper pages (1 Alarm and 3 Food). In Eight Key find all the key correctly and some minimap can help to find the key & blue purple portal to make them easier. Avoid from spike ball that will following you and Find "You Win" Sign, If you not collecting the pages or key, You cannot finishing it.

Controls: WASD / Arrow Key for Walk and Space Bar for Jump.

Sound & Music Credits to Freesound.org
